Package com.github.games647.craftapi.resolver

Interface AuthResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MojangResolver
    public interface AuthResolver
    Resolver that handles authentication requests.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Account authenticate​(String email, String password)
      Logs the given player account in.
      void changeSkin​(Account account, RenderedImage pngImage, Model skinModel)
      Changes the skin to the given image.
      void changeSkin​(Account account, URL toUrl, Model skinModel)
      Changes the skin to the image that can be downloaded from that URL.
      Optional<Verification> hasJoined​(String username, String serverHash, InetAddress hostIp)
      Verifies if a player requesting to join an online mode server is actually authenticated against Mojang.
      boolean resetSkin​(Account account)
      Clears the uploaded skin.

    • Method Detail

      • hasJoined

        Optional<Verification> hasJoined​(String username,
                                 String serverHash,
                                 InetAddress hostIp)
                          throws IOException
        Verifies if a player requesting to join an online mode server is actually authenticated against Mojang.
        Parameters:
        username - the joining username
        serverHash - server id hash
        hostIp - the player connecting IP address
        Returns:
        the verification response or empty if invalid
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O exception contacting the server

      • authenticate

        Account authenticate​(String email,
                     String password)
              throws IOException,
                     InvalidCredentialsException
        Logs the given player account in.
        Parameters:
        email - email address
        password - plain text password
        Returns:
        logged in account
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O exception contacting the server
        InvalidCredentialsException - invalid auth data

      • changeSkin

        void changeSkin​(Account account,
                URL toUrl,
                Model skinModel)
         throws IOException
        Changes the skin to the image that can be downloaded from that URL. The URL have to be direct link without things like HTML in it.
        Parameters:
        account - authenticated account
        toUrl - the URL that Mojang should use for downloading the skin from
        skinModel - skin arm model
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O exception contacting the server

      • changeSkin

        void changeSkin​(Account account,
                RenderedImage pngImage,
                Model skinModel)
         throws IOException
        Changes the skin to the given image.
        Parameters:
        account - authenticated account
        pngImage - png image
        skinModel - skin arm model
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O exception contacting the server

      • resetSkin

        boolean resetSkin​(Account account)
           throws IOException
        Clears the uploaded skin.
        Parameters:
        account - authenticated account
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O exception contacting the server
